author: Juan Cruz
title: Quiero ser titular y poner en alto a México: Sebastián Córdova | ABC Noticias
text: Ciudad de México.- Sebastián Córdova aseguró que su objetivo para el Mundial 2026 es consolidarse como titular en la Selección Mexicana y poner en alto el nombre del país. El futbolista de Tigres habló para las redes sociales del 'Tri', durante su primera concentración bajo el mando de Javier Aguirre y se dijo feliz de tener la oportunidad de regresar al combinado nacional, ya que es un objetivo que siempre ha tenido en mente. “Consolidarme acá, antes que nada, me gustaría ser aquí titular, quiero siempre dar la cara hacia mi país. Entonces es buscar eso, tener las oportunidades que se me den, aprovecharlas al máximo y siempre poner en alto a México”, comentó el jugador auriazul. El atacante de 27 años adelantó que el objetivo de la Selección en el Mundial 2026, que se juega en el país junto a Estados Unidos y Canadá, es ser un equipo atractivo que la afición disfrute de ver y no solo llegar a Cuartos de Final, instancia que no se alcanza desde México 1986, cuando el 'Tri' cayó en penales contra Alemania en el Estadio Universitario de Nuevo León. “El objetivo siempre va a ser, más allá del quinto partido, que seamos una Selección muy intensa, que sea gustosa para el público, que sea algo que les guste a toda la afición, que tenga las ganas de venir a apoyar y que se una más todavía eso de la afición con el jugador y buscar hacer historia”, añadió. Córdova se ganó la convocatoria de regreso a selección gracias a su titularidad en Tigres. Esta temporada ha disputado los 10 encuentros del club en Liga MX y Leagues Cup -7 como titular-, en los que ha marcado un gol y dio 2 asistencias. El jugador de Tigres no fue un habitual en las convocatorias de Jaime Lozano. Los últimos partidos que disputó fueron los amistosos contra Ghana y Alemania en octubre del año pasado, aunque también estuvo convocado a los Cuartos de Final de la CONCACAF Nations League ante Honduras, pero no tuvo actividad. Desde entonces no fue tomado en cuenta para el Final Four de la Liga de Naciones, la Copa América, ni los últimos cuatro partidos amistosos de Jaime Lozano.

author: Akash Pandey
title: Toddler trapped inside Tesla car with depleted battery rescued
text:
Toddler trapped inside Tesla car with depleted battery rescued
Akash Pandey
A 20-month-old toddler was trapped inside a
Tesla Model Y during an Arizona heat wave, when the vehicle's battery unexpectedly died.
The toddler's grandmother, Renee Sanchez, discovered she was unable to access the car due to the battery failure, CBS-affiliated news station AZFamily reported.
Despite initial concerns about accessing the vehicle due to its make, firefighters managed to rescue the child by breaking a window with an axe.
Debate over responsibility for Tesla's safety issues
The incident has sparked a debate over who should be responsible for these safety issues.
Usually, Tesla owners receive alerts when the 12V battery responsible for the vehicle's electrical systems is running low.
However, Sanchez reported that she did not receive an alert about her car's low battery, a claim later confirmed by a
[Tesla]( https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/auto/tesla ) representative.
While the vehicle does have a manual latch for emergency exits, it was not a viable solution given the toddler's age.
Other incidents of people being trapped in Tesla vehicles
This is not an isolated case as there have been other reports of people getting trapped inside Tesla vehicles due to similar issues.
Arizona local and Tesla owner Rick Meggison shared his own experience of being trapped in his Tesla during extreme heat.
"You don't know it's there unless you know it's there," Meggison told Phoenix
['s ABC15.
]( https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/world/phoenix )
Criticism of Tesla's approach to safety
Michael Brooks, the Executive Director of the Center for Auto Safety, criticized Tesla for choosing "electronic door latches that don't have proper emergency safeguards" and prioritizing "form over function." He further stated, "When there's not a federal standard that specifies how these vehicles are to be made, Tesla very rarely chooses routes that are safe. They're usually choosing something glitzy: safety comes last."

author: Micah Quintin Global News
title: Southern Alberta organizations see more demand for Christmas donations | Globalnews.ca
text:
Despite the economic challenges so many are facing, people still opened their hearts and their wallets to those who needed it most this holiday season.
The Shop of Wonders in Lethbridge was able to provide toys to more than 3,600 kids and 350 volunteers put in more than 5,000 hours of work to ensure families could receive a gift for Christmas.
And the holiday cheer spread to the Lethbridge Salvation Army, with more than $128,000 raised as part of its Christmas Kettle campaign.
That money will provide support throughout the year for its food distribution program, along with the Toys for Tots campaign, which is part of the Christmas Hope project.
A goal was set by six groups it partners with in Lethbridge to help over 10,000 people facing financial hardships.
Story continues below advertisement “I would be willing to put ourselves out there and say that we’ve likely exceeded that just based on the demand that we have seen this year,” says Lt. Zach Marshall, community ministries officer with the Salvation Army.
4:45 Salvation Army still trying to reach fundraising goal Meanwhile, the Calgary Food Bank has seen an unprecedented demand for help this season.
Get the latest National news. Sent to your email, every day. Last year at this time the charity was helping serve over 400 households per day, but many more needed the support this year.
“Today we will easily have 700 households coming to the Calgary Food Bank looking for food support,” says Melissa From, president & CEO of the organization.
1:57 Lethbridge food bank use increasing as provincial food insecurity trends up And in Lethbridge, the food bank is seeing a similar demand with its largest need coming from single-family households. Food bank officials say they typically see a decline in donations once the ball drops on New Year’s Eve.
Story continues below advertisement “We hope to get through the next few months here. We have a pretty good stock to get through as long as the numbers hold steady, we’ll be okay. We’re mostly worried if the numbers keep climbing after Christmas,” says Mac Nichol, executive director of the food bank.
2:01 Lethbridge holiday campaigns are looking for donations this season The popular Angel Tree campaign also delivered gift bundles to 4,253 individuals up until Dec. 24 this year.
Final numbers for the Christmas Hope campaign will be released in January.
Related News ‘Sock It To ‘Em’ campaign supporting Lethbridge charities enters 23rd year Edmonton’s ‘Can Man Dan’ camping out in support of food bank once again

author: Redação Terra
title: Padre é preso suspeito de traficar Viagra e outros afrodisíacos na Espanha
text:
Padre é preso suspeito de traficar Viagra e outros afrodisíacos na Espanha
Alfonso Raúl Masa Soto era um pároco popular na Igreja de San Sebastian
Padre Alfonso Raúl Masa Soto foi preso na Espanha, junto com seu companheiro, por suspeita de traficar Viagra e outras substâncias afrodisíacas em Don Benito. Foram encontrados na busca dois quilogramas de mefedrona.
O padre Alfonso Raúl Masa Soto foi preso, junto com seu companheiro, por suspeita de traficarem Viagra e outras substâncias afrodisíacas em Don Benito, na Espanha. A prisão aconteceu no início desta semana em uma operação da Guarda Civil contra o tráfico de substâncias danosas à saúde pública.
Alfonso Raúl era pároco da Igreja de San Sebastian. Ele teria se envolvido com o homem com quem suspostamente mantém um relacionamento amoroso e viviam juntos.
Na casa dos dois, a Guarda Civil encontrou mercadorias relacionadas ao tráfico de Viagra e outras substâncias afrodisíacas sendo preparadas para serem vendidas.
Segundo a agência Europa Press, na busca foram encontrados “dois quilogramas de mefedrona, um tipo de droga que produz efeitos semelhantes aos das anfetaminas que se tornaram populares em zonas de diversão noturna”.
A imprensa espanhola afirma que Masa Soto já está em liberdade, mas deverá comparecer à Justiça duas vezes ao mês. O nome do companheiro do padre não foi divulgado.

author: sina.com.cn
title: 天津创业环保股份(01065.HK)：一季度净利润2.55亿元 同比增加1.26%|天津创业环保股份_新浪财经_新浪网
text: 格隆汇4月24日丨 天津 创业环保 股份(01065.HK)公布2025年第一季度报告，实现营业收入11.02亿元(人民币，下同)，同比增加2.05%；归属于本公司股东的净利润2.55亿元，同比增加1.26%；归属于本公司股东的扣除非经常性损益的净利润2.38亿元，同比增加1.12%；基本每股收益0.162元。
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance

author: Agence QMI
title: Le Canada demeure aux côtés de l’Ukraine, dit Trudeau | JDM
text: Le Canada demeure aux côtés de l’Ukraine, dit Trudeau Le Canada a emboîté le pas à plusieurs pays occidentaux en réaffirmant son soutien à l’Ukraine, vendredi, après que le pays eut subi sa pire attaque de missiles depuis le début de la guerre avec la Russie. • À lire aussi: [Londres annonce l'envoi à l'Ukraine de 200 missiles antiaériens](https://www.journaldemontreal.com/2023/12/29/londres-annonce-lenvoi-a-lukraine-de-200-missiles-antiaeriens) • À lire aussi: [Vastes frappes russes en Ukraine: Biden appelle le Congrès à «agir sans plus attendre»](https://www.journaldemontreal.com/2023/12/29/vastes-frappes-russes-en-ukraine-biden-appelle-le-congres-a-agir-sans-plus-attendre) • À lire aussi: [Vastes frappes russes sur l'Ukraine: au moins 30 morts et 160 blessés](http://www.tvanouvelles.ca/2023/12/28/ukraine-frappes-russes-sur-les-villes-de-kharkiv-et-lviv) «Dans la foulée de ce dernier assaut brutal de la Russie, la bravoure et la résilience du peuple ukrainien perdurent. Volodymyr, votre combat est également le nôtre. Le Canada continuera de soutenir l'Ukraine, quoi qu'il en coûte et aussi longtemps qu'il le faudra», a affirmé sur X le premier ministre Justin Trudeau en soirée. Celui-ci répondait à un message publié auparavant par le président ukrainien Volodymyr Zelensky qui a relayé une vidéo montrant les destructions engendrées par l’attaque russe dans plusieurs villes. Le président a assuré qu’une maternité, des écoles, un centre commercial, des édifices résidentiels, des maisons, un entrepôt commercial et un stationnement ont notamment été touchés par les frappes. La Russie aurait tiré pas moins de 110 missiles en tout genre sur l’Ukraine, tuant au moins une trentaine de personnes selon Kyïv. Avant M. Trudeau, la ministre des Affaires étrangères Mélanie Joly s’était aussi tournée vers les réseaux sociaux pour déplorer l’attaque russe. «Le Canada condamne fermement ces attaques contre l’Ukraine et l’invasion illégale de Poutine. Nous resterons solidaires avec l’Ukraine», a-t-elle indiqué. Le Canada n’a cependant pas annoncé une nouvelle tranche d’aide dans l’immédiat.
